text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap appears to be in pain during<n>training,
so I take her to the infirmary.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
..."Take it easy for a few days," huh? I<n>thought I
could push through the pain,<n>but my poor
decision has come back to<n>bite me...
choice_data_list: So you knew you were injured.
So you knew you were injured.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
...I'm sorry. I didn't mean to hide it from<n>you. I just
thought I could handle it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I didn't want to stop running over some<n>minor
injury.
choice_data_list: Let's not rush things. Take it easy for now.
Then heal up quick and get running!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
choice_data_list: No. I understand how much you love running.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thanks... Yeah, running means the world<n>to me.
choice_data_list: Then you should focus on your recovery.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Got it. I wanna get back on the track<n>soon...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Erring on the side of caution, I decide to<n>give
Oguri Cap one final assignment for<n>the day—to
rest up.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I wanna get back to running as soon as<n>possible...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The doctor told me I should take it easy.<n>Hmm,
who am I supposed to listen to?

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
My attempt at encouraging Oguri ends<n>up
confusing her and ultimately prolongs<n>her
recovery time...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Heal up quick? That means there's no<n>time to
waste. Okay—I know what to do.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I just need to use the, uh, plabeco<n>effect... to
convince myself I'm okay.<n>Someone I met in the
woods once told<n>me all about it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm healing up quickly to get running...I'm healing up quick to get running... I'mhealing up quickly, and I will get back torunning soon!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
This strategy seems to work wonders, as<n>the next
day, Oguri Cap turns up to<n>training looking fit as
a fiddle.
